animeDescription: The protagonist, Ryuu or Crying Dragon, is a mysterious man who often plays games with the gang members. He only wins by "ron," a move in which one needs to wait for the opponent's tile to complete the win.  *"Ron" is also called "naki" in mahjong, which has the same pronunciation as "crying" in Japanese.
animeRelated: ['Mahjong Hishoden: Naki no Ryuu', 'Naki no Ryuu: Hiryuu no Shou (1991)']
